entry.title: 14"x108" Dusty Rose Satin Embroidered Sheer Organza Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 3.39 - 643.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Runner
Material: Organza with Satin
Color: Dusty Rose
Size: 14" x 108" including 3" Satin Borders
Edges: Serged
How To Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use a dryer.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

ONE-OF-A-KIND Leaf-Motif Embroidered Organza With Satin Table Runner

Add a dash of elegant sophistication into your wedding and banquet tables with these delicately fashioned see-thru organza runners accented with the standout nature of satin and stunning leaf-motif embroidery. Let this avant-garde design impart a swanky touch to your table decor, outshining your event and celebration. Bring the best out of your table cloths by adorning them with these chic runners that combine the delicacy of sheer organza fabric with the modern flair of satin Leaf-Motif embroidery and glossy sheen of silky satin borders.

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Table Runner
  • Material: Organza With Satin
  • Color: Dusty Rose
  • Size: 14" x 108" including 3" satin borders
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
    Save

entry.title: 6FT | Natural Premium Chiffon Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 3.99 - 687.70 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Runner
Material: High Quality Chiffon Fabric
Color: Natural
Length: 6 FT
Width: 1.8 FT
Seamless: Yes
Edges are Serged
Flows and Folds Without Creases.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Spread these Chiffon Table runners charmingly atop your colorful or plain table covers to add a dreamy aspect to your tablescape. It can give a softer feel to a rustic wood table top or can be themed with some plain linen to create a change in texture. Gather it as much or as little as you want or tie it off with ribbon to create beautiful folds.

    Pair these with botanicals, taper candleholders, compote bowls, candle holders, delicate florals, geometric terrariums, agate ideas, candlestick holders, candelabras for a chic wedding look. These runners can be used on your guest tables or to enhance side tables at your venue. Place over wooden entrance tables or your guest book table for that extra special touch.

    Additional Information:
    • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
    • For Table Runner only, does not include any other decorations
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Quantity: 1 Runner
Material: High Quality Chiffon Fabric
Color: Champagne
Length: 6 FT
Width: 1.8 FT
Seamless: Yes
Edges are Serged
Flows and Folds Without Creases.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Spread these Chiffon Table runners charmingly atop your colorful or plain table covers to add a dreamy aspect to your tablescape. It can give a softer feel to a rustic wood table top or can be themed with some plain linen to create a change in texture. Gather it as much or as little as you want or tie it off with ribbon to create beautiful folds.

    Pair these with botanicals, taper candleholders, compote bowls, candle holders, delicate florals, geometric terrariums, agate ideas, candlestick holders, candelabras for a chic wedding look. These runners can be used on your guest tables or to enhance side tables at your venue. Place over wooden entrance tables or your guest book table for that extra special touch.

    Additional Information:
    • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
    • For Table Runner only, does not include any other decorations
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

entry.title: 14"x108" Blush | Rose Gold Organza Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 0.99 - 455.40 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Runner
Material: Nylon Organza
Color: Blush | Rose Gold
Size: 14" W x 108" L
Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Beautiful and charming crystal organza runners are a real treat to eyes and big attention grabbers. Add that sophisticated touch of chic elegance into your event’s décor with our splendid sheer organza runners. Made from premium quality nylon, these runners will impart an impeccable sheen and glossy luster to your plain reception or wedding tables, creating that super WOW factor you so eagerly want to attain. Spread these atop your plain or colorful table linens to create wonderful contrastive effects, in the hues that complement your wedding day theme.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 14" wide x 108"
  • Material: Nylon Organza
  • Color: Blush
  • Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • For table runner only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Linen Care Instructions
